about_the_game:
Get your hands on The Symbiant Artbook (PDF) and a juicy pack of 4K CGs and sprites from the game! Peak into the behind-the-scenes sketches, art direction process of the game and more!

What you get:


  • All of the PG-13 CGs from the game
  • Each CG shown in a WIP stage of art
  • Character sprites and expressions
  • Exclusive promo-art pieces, commissioned through the course of the game's development
  • Character and CG sketch preview from The Symbiant: After Stories DLC
  • All the backgrounds from the game
  • An artbook of 79 pages
  • A pack of 4K (high resolution) all the sprites and all the PG-13 CGs from the game with all of the variations (Separate folder from the Artbook!)
detailed_description:
Get your hands on The Symbiant Artbook (PDF) and a juicy pack of 4K CGs and sprites from the game! Peak into the behind-the-scenes sketches, art direction process of the game and more!

What you get:

  • Character sprites and expressions
  • Exclusive promo-art pieces, commissioned through the course of the game's development

  • All the backgrounds from the game
  • An artbook of 79 pages
  • A pack of 4K (high resolution) all the sprites and all the PG-13 CGs from the game with all of the variations (Separate folder from the Artbook!)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo, AMD Phenom II or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
